tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(255),
  metric_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_type VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    issue_status VARCHAR(20),
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    reported_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolved_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    ip_address INET,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY(device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE service_outages (
    outage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    outage_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    avg_value FLOAT,
    trend_category VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_model VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    download_speed FLOAT,
    upload_speed FLOAT,
    latency INT
);
